mapper.select: select pact_code, pact_type_code, state_code, pact_name, original_code, master_pact_code, sign_date, dept_id, dept_no, emp_id, sup_id, sup_no, opp_emp, opp_phone, trade_type, start_date, end_date, is_bid, organ_type, buy_type, is_init, state, maker, make_date, proj_id, proj_no, cont_term1, cont_term2, cont_term3, cont_term4, cont_term5, cont_term6, note, pact_money, is_total_cont, is_price_cont from pact_main_fkxy where group_id=#{group_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC} and hos_id=#{hos_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC} and copy_code=#{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and pact_code = #{pact_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pact_main_fkxy ( group_id, hos_id, copy_code, pact_code, pact_type_code, state_code, pact_name, original_code, master_pact_code, sign_date, dept_id, dept_no, emp_id, sup_id, sup_no, opp_emp, opp_phone, trade_type, start_date, end_date, is_bid, organ_type, buy_type, is_init, state, maker, make_date, proj_id, cont_term1, cont_term2, cont_term3, cont_term4, cont_term5, cont_term6, note, pact_money, is_total_cont, is_price_cont ) VALUES( #{group_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{hos_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pact_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pact_type_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pact_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{original_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{master_pact_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_date(#{sign_date},'yyyy-MM-dd'), #{dept_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dept_no,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{emp_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{sup_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{sup_no,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{opp_emp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opp_phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trade_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_date(#{start_date},'yyyy-MM-dd'), to_date(#{end_date},'yyyy-MM-dd'), #{is_bid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{organ_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buy_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{is_init,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{state,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{maker,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, to_date(#{make_date},'yyyy-MM-dd'), #{proj_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{cont_term1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cont_term2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cont_term3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cont_term4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cont_term5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cont_term6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pact_money,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{is_total_cont,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{is_price_cont,jdbcType=NUMERIC} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE PACT_MAIN_FKXY SET
state_code=#{state_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pact_name=#{pact_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
original_code=#{original_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, master_pact_code=#{master_pact_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sign_date=to_date(#{sign_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-MM-dd'),
dept_id=#{dept_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
dept_no=#{dept_no,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
emp_id=#{emp_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
sup_id=#{sup_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
sup_no=#{sup_no,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
opp_emp=#{opp_emp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
opp_phone=#{opp_phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trade_type=#{trade_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
curr_code=#{curr_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_date=to_date(#{start_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-MM-dd'),
end_date=to_date(#{end_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-MM-dd'),
organ_type=#{organ_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, buy_type=#{buy_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state=#{state,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
cont_term1=#{cont_term1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cont_term2=#{cont_term2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cont_term3=#{cont_term3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cont_term4=#{cont_term4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cont_term5=#{cont_term5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cont_term6=#{cont_term6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
note=#{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pact_money=#{pact_money,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
proj_id = #{proj_id}, is_bid=#{is_bid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, is_total_cont=#{is_total_cont,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, is_price_cont=#{is_price_cont,jdbcType=NUMERIC} WHERE GROUP_ID = #{group_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND HOS_ID = #{hos_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND COPY_CODE = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND pact_code = #{pact_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and is_init = #{is_init,jdbcType=NUMERIC}

UPDATE PACT_MAIN_FKXY SET
state_code=#{state_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
checker=#{checker,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
check_date=#{check_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
confirmer=#{confirmer,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
confirm_date=#{confirm_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
stoper=#{stoper,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
stop_date=#{stop_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
filer=#{filer,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
file_date=#{file_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
state=#{state,jdbcType=NUMERIC} WHERE GROUP_ID = #{group_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND HOS_ID = #{hos_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND COPY_CODE = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND pact_code in
#{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
